title: Aatrox "rework"...who thought that this was a good idea?
body: I am coming from an area where Aatrox was garbage before his rework, and I don't really think this patch made him better. Just worse. What do you guys think? Does Riot need to repeal this rework?

replies.body: Well the current aatrox, albeit is weaker, has more potential. Either way Rick maher doesn't like listening to suggestions much from what some can tell.
If this is Rick Maher's idea of a good rework...he might need to be fired...or reassigned.
Well what do you expect from a nerdy ugly weak pathetic nerd who is detached from reality?
